casebody.data:
ADOPTION OF IDO (and five companion cases1 ). 18-P-46 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: April 9, 2019

1

--------

The portion of the order denying the mother's motion for posttermination and postadoption visitation as it relates to visitation between the mother and Jane is vacated. The order declining to provide a specific order for sibling visitation or contact is also vacated. The matter is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the memorandum and order of the Appeals Court. The decrees are otherwise affirmed.
